remarks: Value of a function given by ordered-pair class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.)
statement:
fvopab3ig.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
fvopab3ig.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
fvopab3ig.3 $e |- ( x e. C -> E* y ph ) $.
fvopab3ig.4 $e |- F = { <. x , y >. | ( x e. C /\ ph ) } $.
fvopab3ig $p |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. D ) -> ( ch -> ( F ` A ) = B ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d ch x y $.
